title: Im appearing offline and cant be invited
body: Is something bugged for me or is there some setting i have to change please help! {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Do you have a < or > (less-than or greater than) symbol in your status in-game? If so you'll need to remove these as they cause issues.
Oh thanks that really helped C:{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
